summary.span: 实现一个结构，该结构用于描述对象的 。

span.span: Implements a structure that is used to describe the of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特别有用，因为它同时描述 对象的和 。 is particularly useful because it describes both the and of an object. 布局系统广泛使用来排列和度量元素。 is used extensively by the layout system to arrange and measure elements. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values width *width* 一个大于或等于0的值，该值指定 结构的。A value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the of the structure. *高**height* 一个大于或等于0的值，该值指定 结构的。A value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the of the structure. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在代码中使用结构。The following example demonstrates how to use a structure in code. [!code-cpp[PlotPanel#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PlotPanel/CPP/PlotPanel.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PlotPanel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PlotPanel/CSharp/PlotPanel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PlotPanel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PlotPanel/VisualBasic/PlotPanel.vb#2)]
